snippet.title: Total War: WARHAMMER 2 - Mortal Empires Trailer
snippet.description:
THE TRAILER FOOTAGE SHOWN USES THE IN-GAME ENGINE
Video type: Cinematic Trailer
What does this mean? Full info here: ➤http://wiki.totalwar.com/w/About_our_trailers

Mortal Empires is a new grand-scale campaign, free to owners of both Total War: WARHAMMER and Total War: WARHAMMER II. Once downloaded, the campaign is accessible through the Campaigns Menu in Total War: WARHAMMER II.

Discover the combined Old World and the New World. Mortal Empires invites you to embark upon colossal new campaigns playing as Legendary Lord from both games. 

For all the latest info, follow us on social media:
➤http://www.facebook.com/totalwar
➤http://www.twitter.com/totalwar
➤http://www.instagram.com/totalwarofficial
➤http://www.twitch.tv/totalwarofficial
